authorityNote: Non-authoritative interpretive mapping maintained by Canonical ESG. This pack documents interpretations of UN SDG requirements using Canonical ESG disclosure intents. It does not claim authoritative status relative to the UN SDG framework. Users must consult official UN SDG documentation for definitive requirements.

mappings.disclosureSummary: Disclosure of economic inclusion and poverty reduction initiatives
mappings.interpretiveRationale: SDG 1 requires disclosure of poverty reduction efforts. The CDI Sustainability risk identification processes provides the canonical semantic mapping for economic inclusion disclosure. Poverty reduction initiatives are disclosed through related economic CDIs.
mappings.scopeConditions: Economic scope covers all poverty reduction initiatives within the entity's operations. Temporal scope covers the reporting period.
